review: The fire stick video can be choppy sometimes. The interface that appears when first turned on is a little confusing, Voice search with the fire HD 6 only searches through amazon's offerings and not netflix or any other apps. I bought this for HBO GO because Comcast won't let HBO GO work with a roku and I was a little disappointed. Hulu plus, Netflix, and youtube all work fine but HBO GO always has choppy video. Not sure if this is HBO GOs fault or the fire stick. Roku 1 box is better I think but for $25 it is okay for maybe a tv not in the living room.

review: I got this device to replace a Roku and didn't like it at all. I gave it about 2 weeks before just throwing it in a drawer and getting a new Roku. The user interface is horrible if you want to watch anything other than Amazon content. I like to watch Hulu and it was basically impossible with the Fire stick. I couldn't keep my Wi-Fi connection, despite being in the same room as the router, and when it did have a connection the video quality was terrible. These are problems I don't have using a Roku. I love Amazon Prime, but I'll continue to watch using the app for Roku. The Fire stick is garbage.
